text: Ricardo Adé Kat (born 21 May 1990) is a Haitian professional footballer who plays for Chilean club Magallanes, as a defender. Born in Saint-Marc, he represents Haiti at international level. ==Career== Adé has played in the United States for Miami United, and in Chile for Santiago Morning. In 2017, Adé arrived to Santiago Morning. On his first season, he played 23 matches and scored 1 goal. He made his international debut for Haiti in 2016. ==External links== * ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:People from Saint-Marc Category:Haitian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Baltimore SC players Category:Don Bosco FC players Category:Santiago Morning footballers Category:Ligue Haïtienne players Category:Primera B de Chile players Category:Haiti international footballers Category:Haitian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Chile Category:Haitian expatriate sportspeople in Chile Category:Haitian expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:2019 CONCACAF Gold Cup players
title: Ricardo Adé
